name: Uploading the same plugin twice prompts to overwrite

customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P3 - Deep Functions (Do extensive scenarios work?)

inline.description:
Uploading the same plugin twice prompts to overwrite
————————————————————————————
  1. After uploading the plugin, try to upload the same one again
  2. Cancel out, no changes
  3. Try again
  4. Click Overwrite at overwrite prompt "A plugin with this ID already exists. Would you like to overwrite it?"
inline.expectedResult: • Plugin is overwritten; success message displays "Successfully updated plugin from com.mattermost.demo-plugin-0.0.5.tar.gz"

customFields.Related ticket(s): (Story) Update mechanism for plugins — MM-8662
